article:
A man liked to climb tall mountains. After years of   _  , he felt he could
handle any mountain in the world.
During a climbing trip, with five other men, he   _  he would first make the

So he headed toward the top and he was  _  that

was foolish to climb at night alone, he did use a rope and put in good piton   protection. With the   _  of the moon, he made rapid progress. But  _  ,

visibility  _  to almost zero. It was now too
late to  turn back  , so he continued to climb up the mountain.
While   _  in total darkness, he got into some rotten rock, and slid over the edge of

Suddenly, from above he seemed to hear a strong deep voice, "  _  the rope!" What?
Once again, he heard a deep voice saying that. But  _  followed, as the climber continued to hang onto the rope, hoping to grab

Unable to see his true  _  , the climber concluded that

The following day, his teammates discovered him   _  to death, still on
